segments.text: How happy you are ! Next Monday is your wedding day . Congratulations !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fred is really a good guy . And he loves you so much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I'm lucky to be his wife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's after your own heart , it is important .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So he will make a perfect husband . Make sure you will be here next Monday .
segments.speaker: S2
